snippet: President Obama on Wednesday nominated Gen. Joseph F. Dunford Jr., the assistant commandant of the Marine Corps, as the top American and NATO commander in Afghanistan.
abstract: Pres Obama nominates Gen Joseph F Dunford Jr, assistant commandant of Marine Corps, as top American and NATO commander in Afghanistan; Dunford is to replace Gen John R Allen, who is in turn nominated by Obama to replace Adm James G Stavridis as supreme allied commander of NATO.
lead_paragraph: President Obama on Wednesday nominated Gen. Joseph F. Dunford Jr., the assistant commandant of the Marine Corps, as the top American and NATO commander in Afghanistan.

headline.seo: Dunford Nominated to Lead Afghanistan War
headline.main: Commander Nominated to Lead War in Afghanistan
headline.print_headline: Commander Nominated To Lead War In Afghanistan

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
